quotes.quote: Wisely, and slow. They stumble that run fast
quotes.description: Wisely, and slow. They stumble that run fast - description
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them
quotes.description: If you judge people, you have no time to love them - description

quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible
quotes.description: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible- description
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once
quotes.description: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
quotes.description: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.-description
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling,
